title: Santuri 2007 Divx with English Subtitle
description:
<a href="http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0385277/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0385277/</a>

Included English Subtitle | Film Music

Director: Dariush Mehrjui
Writer: Dariush Mehrjui, Vahid Mohammadi
Release Date: 2007 (Iran-1386)
Genre: Drama / Musical

A very famous and successful Santoor ( Iranian traditional instrument )
player falls in the trap of drugs and loses everything in his life gradually even his wife who was in love with him.
he struggles to give up smoking and finds his way to a medical institute and manages to give up smoking.
